OOC: hmm... that falls under pulling new technology out mid battle.  however 
if you were to post finding it or discovering that he had it (or if you 
already posted for it and i missed it) than yes, but make it a good post.  In 
short post a valid reason for having the defense before you have to use it.

--part1_de.2cc73a7a.2aad601d_boundary
